div.p: ANTONIO: People may keep secrets, or hide things from themselves using defense mechanisms, but still... some things are simply overlooked.
ANTONIO: Here's an example. Just about everyone is aware that their arrest, divorce, or job loss is costly.
ANTONIO: But most of us aren't aware of how much these problems actually cost. Sometimes the costs get so spread out that we lose track of the total.
ANTONIO: We can learn a lot by determining how much our problems really cost us, so in the next activity we'll do just that. Before we start calculating, you'll need to answer some questions.
ANTONIO: Remember, your responses will be completely confidential.
